name: Skyshot (Pkfier)
description:
A customer has ordered a new package. 

Now Apo, a special delivery robot, needs to make sure the package reaches its destination safely to earn some money. 

Good luck!

Controls:

Z: Jump

X: Shoot hook / Throw

Tap X without holding: FLY towards an enemy

Hold X: PULL an enemy

Hold Z while lifting an enemy: BASH

Left and Right: Move

Up: Enter door

R: Start over
